Package org.drools.brms.server.util

Interface Summary
BRLPersistence  
 

Class Summary
BRDRLPersistence This class persists the rule model to DRL and back
BRDRLPersistence.LHSPatternVisitor  
BRDRLPersistence.RHSActionVisitor  
BRMSSuggestionCompletionLoader This decorates the suggestion completion loader with BRMS specific stuff.
BRXMLPersistence This class persists the rule model to XML and back.
ClassicDRLImporter This class imports legacy DRL into a structure suitable for storing more normalised in the repository.
ClassicDRLImporter.Asset Holds a rule to import.
DataEnumLoader Use mvel to load up map/list of valid items for fields - used by the Guided rule editor.
FormData  
MetaDataMapper This utility uses reflection to map from the MetaData DTO to the AssetItem back end class, to adhere to the DRY principle.
RowLoader  
SuggestionCompletionEngineBuilder A builder to incrementally populate a SuggestionCompletionEngine
TableDisplayHandler This utility class handles loading of tables.
TestEnvironmentSessionHelper This is only to be used for testing, eg in hosted mode, or unit tests.
